column4: help please. why i have to unplug wlan whenever i booted ubuntu. if not, wlan is not recognized
What WLAN adapter are you using?
i used ralink rt73, it recognized. but i have to unplug and plug in again after boot
sil3nt|warri0r: hope you get help on your issues... I would advise you google your device name and see what modules Ubuntu is attempting to load.
